metadata.description: The admin user name for both the Windows and Linux virtual machines.
The admin password for both the Windows and Linux virtual machines.
The count of Windows virtual machines to create.
The count of Windows virtual machines to create.

resources.comments: Log Analytics workspace
resources.name: [variables('logAnalyticsWorkspace')]

resources.comments: Hub virtual network and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('hubNetwork').name]

resources.comments: Subnet for Azure Firewall
resources.name: [concat(parameters('hubNetwork').name, '/', parameters('azureFirewall').subnetName)]

resources.comments: Public IP address for Azure Firewall
resources.name: [parameters('azureFirewall').publicIPAddressName]

resources.comments: Azure Firewall and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('azureFirewall').name]

resources.comments: Route / force tunnel from spokes to Azure firewall
resources.name: [parameters('azureFirewall').routeName]

resources.comments: Network security group + rules for spoke network and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('spokeNetwork').subnetNsgName]

resources.comments: Spoke virtual network, subnet, and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('spokeNetwork').name]

resources.comments: Network security group + rules for spoke network and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('spokeNetworkTwo').subnetNsgName]

resources.comments: Spoke virtual network, subnet, and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('spokeNetworkTwo').name]

resources.comments: Virtual network peering hub to spoke one
resources.name: [concat(parameters('hubNetwork').name, '/', variables('peering-name-hub-to-spoke-one'))]

resources.comments: Virtual network peering hub to spoke two
resources.name: [concat(parameters('hubNetwork').name, '/', variables('peering-name-hub-to-spoke-two'))]

resources.comments: Virtual network peering spoke one to hub
resources.name: [concat(parameters('spokeNetwork').name, '/', variables('peering-name-spoke-to-hub-one'))]

resources.comments: Virtual network peering spoke two to hub
resources.name: [concat(parameters('spokeNetworkTwo').name, '/', variables('peering-name-spoke-to-hub-two'))]

resources.comments: Public IP address for Bastion
resources.name: [parameters('bastionHost').publicIPAddressName]

resources.comments: Network security group, rules for Bastion + diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('bastionHost').nsgName]

resources.comments: Subnet for Bastion
resources.name: [concat(parameters('hubNetwork').name, '/', parameters('bastionHost').subnetName)]

resources.comments: Azure Bastion and diagnostic configuration
resources.name: [parameters('bastionHost').name]

resources.comments: Public IP address for VPN Gateway
resources.name: [parameters('vpnGateway').pipName]

resources.comments: VPN Gateway and diagnostic configuration (optional)
resources.name: [parameters('vpnGateway').name]

resources.comments: Network interface for Windows VMs (optional)
resources.name: [concat(variables('nicNameWindows'), copyIndex())]

resources.comments: Windows VMs (optional)
resources.name: [concat(variables('vmNameWindows'), copyIndex())]

resources.comments: Network interface for Ubuntu VMs (optional)
resources.name: [concat(variables('nicNameLinux'), copyIndex())]

resources.comments: Ubuntu VMs (optional)
resources.name: [concat(variables('vmNameLinux'), copyIndex())]

resources.comments: Azure Firewall Log Analytics workbook
resources.name: [parameters('workbookId')]
